sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.OB_ID AS PROVINCEID, T1.PRO1_VAR AS PROVINCENAME, T2.OB_ID AS CITYID, T2.PRO1_VAR AS CITYNAME FROM MAN_MAJOR_INFO T1, MAN_MAJOR_INFO T2 WHERE T1.OB_NAME = 'province' AND T2.OB_NAME = 'city' AND T2.PRO2_VAR = T1.OB_ID AND T1.MOD_TYPE = 'treecombox' AND T2.MOD_TYPE = 'treecombox'
